VNS_desc:
Add visual cues: add annotation/circle/band/stroke/contour.
Enlarge elements: use magnification.
Change individual graphic appearance: use basic attributes*.
Change individual graphic appearance: use basic attributes*.

Add visual cues: add contour/stroke/symbol.
Demonstrate distribution through layout: use scaffold.

Enhance sequential effects: Show sequential gradient effects in terms of color, texture, scale, etc.
Add visual cues: Add arrow and other auxiliary elements to express sequence.
Demonstrate sequence through layout: Arranged in a shape with a strong sense of direction, such as triangles and spirals.

Apply cut-out images: use icon/clip-art/photo.
Apply layer masks: use icon/clip-art/photo.

Present through colors: use colors.
Present through images: add symbol/emoji/gesture.

Apply comic style: use hand-drawn lines.
Apply MBE style: use thick stokes & breakpoints & staggered fillings.
Apply gradient style: use gradient color.
Apply semiflat style: use dark sides & shadows.
Apply 3D style: use 3D models.
Apply skeuomorphism style: use photos.
Change overall graphic appearance: use color/gradient color/stroke/transparency/texture/shadow/split/shape.
